header.title: About AGCP
header.description: AGCP is a company that supplies asphalt plants, machinery, and services to the construction industry, with core expertise in road construction and transportation infrastructure.

team.title: Founder of AGCP
team.description: Our team is made up of experienced professionals passionate about the construction industry. Meet the founding members of AGCP.

description.after: , we are committed to providing innovative and sustainable solutions for the construction industry. Our mission is to support our clients in delivering road infrastructure projects by offering high-performance equipment and quality service.

services.title: OUR Services
services.description: Thanks to our expertise and commitment, we contribute to the modernization of transportation infrastructure by providing reliable, durable, and industry-compliant solutions.
services.description1: Design and installation of modern, high-performance asphalt plants.
services.description2: A wide range of equipment for road construction, including pavers, compactors, and concrete plants.
services.description3: Responsive after-sales service to ensure proper functioning of the equipment.
services.description4: Study and development of solutions tailored to the specific needs of infrastructure projects.
services.description5: Training programs to optimize equipment use and ensure safety on construction sites.

marque.title: OUR Brands
marque.description: We have collaborated with various brands to provide high-quality solutions in the industry.
